name: Fortune Vision
desc: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Fortune Lady" card from your Deck to your hand. Once per turn, if a card(s) you control is banished by a card effect (except during the Damage Step): You can activate this effect; this turn, monsters you control cannot be destroyed by card effects (even if this card leaves the field). Once per turn, if a card(s) your opponent controls is banished by a card effect (except during the Damage Step): You can activate this effect; the next time you would take battle damage this turn, you do not (even if this card leaves the field). You can only activate 1 "Fortune Vision" per turn.
